attributes.action: encourage research into a device which can convert the energy expended by humans into a power resource.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I don't know if this idea is feasible, but I wonder if scientists could invent a device, no bigger than a wrist watch, for people to wear. It would store the energy expended by them during the day, and at night it would be put into a special 'pod' in the home, connected to the national grid, and the energy collected. People willing to take part in the scheme would have reduced energy bills!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
